comments.content: It could be a slanted **[Maven Pro (Black)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415092421/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=Maven%20Pro%20-%20Black&fid=b4c53f7fcc6e4dc3611864847bc7118b&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=MAY&wrap=2)** [2011] part of Google Web Fonts
